document.full_text: gunmen attacked a minibus carrying mostly shiites and killed eight people in a part of pakistan that has seen a recent peace deal between rival sunni and shiite tribes, a government official said.
document.title: asia: pakistan: fatal attack on minibus
lines_and_colors: gunmen attacked a minibus carrying mostly shiites and killed eight people in a part of pakistan that has seen a recent peace deal between rival sunni and shiite tribes, a government official said.
